upgrade.firmware_large: The uploaded file is too large.
upgrade.platform_unpass: The firmware is not compatible with this device.
upgrade.not_gl: This is not official released firmware.
upgrade.old_version: The uploaded firmware version is older than the current version.
upgrade.advised_not_keep_setting: Kernel version will be upgraded. You are advised not to retain your current settings.
upgrade.unknown_version: This is an unknown version, is 3rd-party firmware or the version is old.
upgrade.sysupgrade_test_failed: Testing the firmware with sysupgrade failed.
upgrade.keep_setting_tips: If this option is enabled, current settings will be retained and you will be prompted to reinstall any User installed packages after the upgrade has completed.
upgrade.accepted_rc_tips: You have accepted the firmware preview plan. Please contact us if you encounter any issues.
upgrade.rc_version_enable_tips: If this option is enabled, you can try out new features before the stable version is issued and provide us with feedback. Note that these upgrades may not be stable. Please check $$$$ What's New? $$$$ for the latest firmware features.
upgrade.rc_version_disable_tips: Please note that disabling this option will not automatically return your firmware to a stable version. If you need to use a stable version of the firmware, please go to $$$$The Download Center $$$$.
